products.title: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Gel Cream
products.description: Hydrating face moisturizer with hyaluronic acid that quenches dry skin and keeps it smooth and supple.

products.title: e.l.f. Cosmetics Blemish Control Primer
products.description: A primer that fights blemishes while prepping your skin for makeup with a smooth finish.

products.title: Revlon ColorStay Pressed Powder
products.description: A long-wearing pressed powder that controls shine and leaves a flawless finish.

products.title: Milani Baked Blush
products.description: Highly pigmented blush with a radiant finish. Easy to blend for a healthy-looking flush.
